availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Green County, Kentucky, native. Married to Elizabeth J. Ball Quesenberry. Father of Martha J. Quesenberry, Margaret A. Quesenberry, Robert W. Quesenberry, Thomas Quesenberry, Junius C. Quesenberry, Narcissa Quesenberry, Sarah E. Quesenberry, and Jeff Davis Quesenberry. Farmer in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 80A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 662.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Lower Bush Creek Precinct, p. 495B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994036, Green County Births.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 51-13052.
"John W. Quesenberry (1820-1905)," Find A Grave, Memorial 67657635, accessed March 2, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/67657635.
